column5:
Thank you.... its been a while since my last visit to reddit and just when i'm in this bad place..this notification pops up..

I'm really tired..mainly of myself.. it seems like i never learnt..history keep repeating itself, like im stuck in this vicious mobius circle, keep getting in trouble again and again..keep having my hopes high up..ended up keep getting hurt again and again...

Thank you for posting this..
